mapper.select: SELECT lecture_date.id, lecture_date.lecture_id, lecture_date.date, lecture_date.reg_date FROM lecture_date LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM applicationform WHERE applicationform.status != -1) as app ON app.lecture_date_id = lecture_date.id WHERE lecture_date.lecture_id = #{lecture_id} AND app.status is null
SELECT id FROM lecture_date ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM lecture_date WHERE lecture_id = #{lecture_id} AND date=#{date}
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture_date SET lecture_id=#{lecture_id}, date=#{date} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lecture_date WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT lecture_date_id FROM application_form WHERE lecture_id = #{lecture_id} AND status != -1) AND lecture_id = #{lecture_id}
